taskBreakdown.title: Implement general functionality

ai.title: Refactor: Significantly reduce the size of the co-describe history files
ai.body:
This PR makes significant changes to the way co-describe history is managed, resulting in a substantial reduction in the size of the history JSON files.  This was achieved by refactoring the `ContextAnalyzer` and updating the history management logic.

The following changes were made:

* **ContextAnalyzer refactoring:** The `ContextAnalyzer.js` file underwent significant modification to optimize the way it processes and stores context information, leading to a more efficient and compact representation.  This reduces the amount of data written to the history files.
* **History file cleanup:** Many of the previous history files were removed, replaced by smaller and more efficient alternatives.
* **Updated README:** The README was updated to reflect the changes made.

The size reduction leads to several improvements:

* **Improved performance:** Smaller history files lead to faster loading and processing times.
* **Reduced storage:** Less storage space is required for the co-describe history.
* **Easier maintenance:**  The revised code is more maintainable and efficient.

This PR includes a significant amount of code deletion (approx 44kb) but the functionality remains intact.  It's recommended to thoroughly test all related functionality after merging.
ai.summary: This PR refactors the co-describe history management, significantly reducing file sizes, improving performance and storage efficiency.

architectureDiagrams.title: Project Architecture
architectureDiagrams.mermaid:
graph TB
    subgraph "Frontend Layer"
        UI[User Interface]
        COMP[Components]
    end

    subgraph "Business Logic Layer"
        SERV[Services]
        WORK[Workflows]
    end

    subgraph "Data Layer"
        API[API Clients]
        CACHE[Cache]
    end

    subgraph "External Services"
        GH[GitHub API]
        LIN[Linear API]
        AI[AI Services]
    end

    UI --> COMP
    COMP --> SERV
    SERV --> WORK
    WORK --> API
    API --> GH
    API --> LIN
    API --> AI
    SERV --> CACHE

    classDef frontend fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2
    classDef business fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2
    classDef data fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#388e3c
    classDef external fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#f57c00
    class UI,COMP frontend
    class SERV,WORK business
    class API,CACHE data
    class GH,LIN,AI external

pr.title: Refactor: Significantly reduce the size of the co-describe history files
pr.body:
This PR makes significant changes to the way co-describe history is managed, resulting in a substantial reduction in the size of the history JSON files.  This was achieved by refactoring the `ContextAnalyzer` and updating the history management logic.

The following changes were made:

* **ContextAnalyzer refactoring:** The `ContextAnalyzer.js` file underwent significant modification to optimize the way it processes and stores context information, leading to a more efficient and compact representation.  This reduces the amount of data written to the history files.
* **History file cleanup:** Many of the previous history files were removed, replaced by smaller and more efficient alternatives.
* **Updated README:** The README was updated to reflect the changes made.

The size reduction leads to several improvements:

* **Improved performance:** Smaller history files lead to faster loading and processing times.
* **Reduced storage:** Less storage space is required for the co-describe history.
* **Easier maintenance:**  The revised code is more maintainable and efficient.

This PR includes a significant amount of code deletion (approx 44kb) but the functionality remains intact.  It's recommended to thoroughly test all related functionality after merging.
